workshoptitle: Create and Publish a Web Application with Oracle Visual Builder

tutorials.title: Prerequisites
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The Introduction is always second. The title and contents menu title match for the Introduction.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Create a Web Application
tutorials.description: Labs that follow the introduction are numbered, starting with Lab 1

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Create Pages for Business Objects in a Visual Builder Web App
Lab 3: Add Navigation and Data to a Visual Builder Web App
Lab 4: Add Pages for Data Manipulation to a Visual Builder Web App
Lab 5: Stage and Publish a Visaul Builder Web App
Lab 6: Create Budsiness Rules in a Visual Builder Web App
Lab 7: Create a Simple Web App for Charts
Lab 8: Add Bar and Area Charts to a Web App
Lab 9: Add Pie Charts and Queries to a Web App
